definitions:
(transitive with su) to be imprinted (leave a print or impression) (on)
le orme del procione si impressero sulla sabbiathe raccoon's footprints were imprinted on the sand

(transitive with in) to be fixed indelibly (in) (the mind, etc.)
quell'immagine mi si Ã¨ impressa nel cervellothat image got fixed in my mind
